original_text: One of the 12 disciples was called Thomas. (He was also called ‘the Twin ’.) He was not with the other disciples when Jesus came to them.
korean_text: 열두 제자 중의 하나로서 디두모라 불리는 도마는 예수께서 오셨을 때에 함께 있지 아니한지라

sentences.original_text: One of the 12 disciples was called Thomas
sentences.korean_translation: 12명의 제자 중 한 명이 토마스라고 불렸습니다

sentences.original_text: He was not with the other disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 제자들과 함께 있지 않았습니다
